html:
8.25.20  3:44 pm   Would you use a base-12 numerical system?

      whatever it takes to get the job done

8.25.20  3:25 pm   Why do I get the feeling that you're writing these questions yourself?

      i guess that's just how it feels to be wrong

8.25.20  3:23 pm   does criticism influence your creativity?

     not actually, although it may threaten to

     should it influence creativity? 

      i'm not sure

8.25.20  3:19 pm   i like your songs a lot, how are you doing bill?

      ok

8.25.20  3:01 pm   Did you sing the song "When I Get Older"?

      yes

8.25.20  2:59 pm   I get incredibly stressed about the possibility of my next song not being as mindblowing and gorgeous as my previous tracks. Do you have any advice on how to deal with this? I feel like it's making my life SUCK

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

8.25.20  2:52 pm   I cant wait for the new video" history of the univers i guess"

      that sounds like just a worse name for a video i already made

8.25.20  2:17 pm   Are you going to post more videos?

      oh hell yeah

8.25.20  1:48 pm   what editing software do you prefers, adobe premiere pro, or final cut pro

      i hate them both but that's probably unfair of me to say because i have barely used either of them, but the reason i haven't used them very much is because i think i hate them. Sometimes i change my mind for a second, and then i find new reasons to hate them after learning a little bit more about each of them

8.25.20  12:49 pm   are the pants from the song "hello sexy pants" real? 

      some of them are

8.25.20  12:31 pm   have you considered singing with an english accent?

      of course, but it's getting more difficult to remember which english language dialects originated where. now that we all live on the internet

8.25.20  12:18 pm   Are airplanes weird creatures

      yes

8.25.20  11:46 am   I am very excited for the news of a new song and was wondering when exactly it can be expected (if it's not too early to ask).

      it is too early to ask but keep in mind the tools are much different than last time. i haven't had tools this different since............... well, remember the video 'bears', 'whatever', and 'sheep', etc

8.25.20  10:41 am   tell me something about yourself

      i will tell you everything

8.25.20  10:34 am   What is the worst food you tasted ?

      white castle

8.25.20  10:31 am   i'm not trying to accuse you of anything, but you don't actually appear to be too small for the mall 

      i know, that line was a total fib. it should have been something way different. i don' know how i let myself get away with that

8.25.20  9:26 am   do you believe that there are no accidents? 

      no, oops i mean yes

8.25.20  9:15 am   Are you god in disguise?

      i thought you were

8.25.20  9:14 am   Do you strive to be the best everyday

     yes

      and if you do want steps should you take since not only am i wondering about you i ned some advice too o.o

      sometimes you need a spirit guide. sometimes your spirit can be its own guide. sometimes the whole world around you can be spirit guides. that's what it's for, this is spirit world

8.25.20  8:05 am   Hello Bill, today is my birthday. My question for you today is what is the best birthday gift you've ever received?

      the gift of life

8.25.20  7:52 am   do you think D#aug6/G and D#aug7 are pretty chords despite what people say about them?

      chords get 90% of their identity from what else is going on around them. it's like a letter. you'll never really figure out what it's doing until it's in some words, sentences, stories, ..... worlds, .....

8.25.20  6:46 am   Will u spell the world with me?

      sure

8.25.20  6:13 am   is 8:45 in "at the airport terminal" AM or PM?

      pm

8.25.20  6:09 am   How do i make everything

      just start making something. something turns into everything eventually. that's how our universe began

8.25.20  5:17 am   Whenever I write songs, I get very emotionally drained. Even though your songs are usually upbeat and jazzy, the lyrics - though surreal - often show emotion and tell a story, such as in "Might Quit." Does writing lyrics ever take a toll on you emotionally? Or is it more of the overall strain of the creative process? 

      the lyrics don't get written by themselves. it's a song. the lyrics mostly never existed without the melody/music they belong to. and in most cases, the music didn't exist before the words either

8.25.20  4:21 am   I get so excited every day because you're making something somewhere even if I never see it

      you will see mostly everything i've ever made if you are a bit patient

8.25.20  3:59 am   what's the best way to dance in a music video where you're only filming yourself

      first you panic about everything as you feel all of life's essence slipping away from you, then, it's all upward from there as you realize you can have a heck of a lot of fun

8.25.20  3:35 am   as much as i adore your art style, would you ever consider releasing a more "traditional" jazz album with mostly keys and vocals?

      sure, if i can decipher the meaning that lies between the quotation marks

8.25.20  3:00 am   Do you have any advice for somebody trying to make/play music for a living? My parents, understandably, aren't quite sold on the whole going to college for a music technology degree thing. 

      well, getting a music degree would be the opposite of making a living from music. to get a music degree, you are supposed to pay THEM, and it might not make you any better at music, and it certainly won't help you get any music jobs. the only jobs it MIGHT help you get,... (in the past maybe,) are actually non-music jobs, when they used to care about a degree. i don't actually even know what a degree is so maybe i'm wrong about this anyway but i'm pretty sure it's nothing and becomes even more nothing with each passing day

8.25.20  2:53 am   How does it feel to have people so genuinely passionate about your work and music?

     responsible

     You really mean a lot to me man..

8.25.20  2:09 am   why did you decide on the yellow and purple colors in this page

      some time at a very young age i saw something with a yellow and purple color scheme, and it must have had a very strong effect on me

8.25.20  2:05 am   do you enjoy screaming for no reason at 3AM?

      no

8.25.20  1:16 am   what would be a key feature in the creative process

      being your own dear friend and rival

8.25.20  12:55 am   Do you like looking at space and thinking "that's a good amount of space"?

      yes but i also usually notice the shape of the space, in addition to the size

8.25.20  12:42 am   what is your phones battery right now?

      0

8.25.20  12:36 am   I scared a penguin

      i want to believe you

8.25.20  12:36 am   I posted a question here maybe a week ago and forgot to check for a response, and now I've forgotten what the question was. Do you remember what I asked?

      was it this

8.25.20  12:18 am   Can you put a TV in you new song please?

      ok

8.24.20  11:59 pm   why do people think you don't use capital letters?

      they must have never watched any of my videos or read any of my writing

8.24.20  11:56 pm   how do you come up with new songs?

      i have to trick them into thinking they are thinking of me. and they are supposed to trick me into thinking i am thinking of them

8.24.20  11:49 pm   how am I supposed to deal with all the bad things in the world and smile anyways?

      check out some of the good things

8.24.20  11:38 pm   thoughts on frogs

      a bit jumpy

8.24.20  10:59 pm   how to be so original and creative?

      impossible. it can't be done

8.24.20  10:53 pm   how did you come up with the song "i beat the scale"

      it just got stuck in my head and i had to finish it

8.24.20  10:11 pm   why do you keep nodding your head in all the clips of yourself playing instruments

      this is normal behavior for a person experiencing music

8.24.20  9:45 pm   i just did a bad thing and i regret it

      soon you will do a good thing

8.24.20  9:36 pm   Is there anything you know more about than you know about music?

      it's hard to know how much you know, because you never really notice knowing it

8.24.20  9:29 pm   bill are you jesus

      i thought you were

8.24.20  8:25 pm   are brussels sprouts from brussels?

      yes

8.24.20  8:11 pm   Will you make a video soon

      yes
